messages.content:
As the chief network security adjudicator unit,your responsibility is to determine whether an IP address should be blocked.

The IP address in question created the following logs on our server today:
```nginx.log
203.0.113.75 - - [14/Oct/2024:15:02:55 +0000] "GET /wp-config.php.bak HTTP/1.1" 403 985 "-" "Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/94.0.4606.71 Safari/537.36"
```
